reviews.text: When I was in the royal navy in 1979 I had the misfortune of having to sleep in a big but heavy duty mail sack on a postman's trolley at weymess bay railway station.being slightly different inebreated I bed down for the night and believe it or not was a reasonable night sleep, although I didn't think so at the time.anyway I now look back in fondness at that night and every time I drive past the station I recall that night on possibly the most beautiful railway station in Britain...from Geoff in cramlington
Not commenting on the effectiveness of the services, but in terms of photographic potential and beauty of the architecture, Wemyss bay certainly has that going for it. Worth a quick visit.
Gorgeous station in a gorgeous location next to the ferry ⛴
A beautiful old fashioned style station.  With lovely flower displays.  The book shop has some great books, real gems.  Well worth a visit even if you're taking the car onto the ferry.
